# Ecosystem functions
  
## forage quality

- year : 2009
- formula : $forage quality = \frac{DDM * DMI}{1.29} = \frac{(88.9 - (0.779 * ADF)) * \frac{120}{NDF}}{1.29}$

## root biomass
- root biomass = fine root biomass + coarse root biomass
```
Root.biomass[, "Root.biomass" := rowSums(.SD,na.rm=T), .SDcols=c("Fine_Roots_Biomass", "Coarse_Roots_Biomass")]
```
